查询下拉框

插件demo如下：

{{sex1}}

插件代码如下：

				JS代码
				
				$scope.sex1 = "0";
				$scope.selectData = [{
					name:"男",
					value:"0"
				},{
					name:"女",
					value:"1"
				}];
				$scope.config = {
					attName:"name",
					strAttValue:"value",
					pinyin:true
				};
				
				Html代码
				
					<gm-query-select binddata="sex1" data="selectData" config = "config" gm-validator="phone">
